(Closed 12-1pm for Lunch)
{Coordinator: Eusheka Bartley 8563796850 
Start: 06/30/2025 END 08/15/2025}", "email": "", "url": "https://easternusa.salvationarmy.org/camden-kroc/help/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1865 Harrison Ave", "address_2": "", "city": "Camden", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08105", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.947704, "longitude": -75.086889}, "phones": [{"number": "(856) 379-6908", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:15", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:15", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:15", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "13:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "13:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "13:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "13:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "13:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
